sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import '../../styles/header.css'; const navLinks = [ { path: '/home', display: 'Home' }, { path: '/about', display: 'About' }, { path: '/cars', display: 'Cars' }, { path: '/blogs', display: 'Blogs' }, { path: '/contact', display: 'Contact' }, ] const Header = () => { const menuRef = useRef(null); const toggleMenu = () => menuRef.current.classList.toggle("menu__active"); return
{/* ========================================================header top======================================================== */}
Need Help? +1-202-555-0149
Login Register
{/* =======================================================header middle========================================================= */}

Rent Car
Service

India

Kolkata, India

Sunday to Friday

10am - 7pm
{/* =======================================================main navigation========================================================= */}
{navLinks.map((item, index) => ( navClass.isActive ? "nav_active nav_item" : "nav_item"} key={index} > {item.display} )) }
}; export default Header
